Shoreline.University Prep:
University Prep, formerly known as University Preparatory Academy and now popularly known as UPrep, is an independent, coeducational middle and high school located in the Wedgewood neighborhood of Seattle, Washington. The campus sits just across the street from Dahl Playfield and is adjacent to the Picardo Farm, the original P-Patch (community garden area).
Approximately 560 students attend University Prep.
